paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: varied clinical manifestations, including cardiac and neurological phenotypes

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The variant Val30Met has different manifestations and penetrance according to the geographical location.
In general, women who carry a pathogenic variant less likely have cardiac involvement.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met variant is associated with variable penetrance and clinical manifestations.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical observations.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance varies significantly based on geographical location and gender.
key_quotes: carrying a pathogenic TTR mutation confers a variable risk of developing CA, which depends on the specific variant, the geographical area, gender and transmitting parent.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
